subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: After Georgetown walloped Pittsburgh, 65-42, last night to win the Big East tournament at Madison Square Garden, the end of the two handshake lines featured the two big centers, the 7-foot-2 Roy Hibbert of Georgetown and the 7-foot Aaron Gray of Pittsburgh.
